value.title: Looking at Power BI Many to Many

value.title: Computing rolling average in DAX
value.excerpt: Computing the rolling 12-months average in DAX looks simple, but it hides some level of complexity. value.title: Specifying multiple filter conditions in CALCULATE
value.excerpt: The filter arguments in CALCULATE can reference multiple columns from the same table in a single predicate: This is possible since March 2021 in Power BI, before that it was possible to filter a single column reference.  Article and download: https://sql.bi/705207?aff=yt  How to learn DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/guides/dax/?aff=yt

value.title: Write DAX formulas for Power BI Desktop models
value.excerpt: In this module, you'll learn how to write DAX formulas to create calculated tables, calculated columns, and measures, which are different types of model calculations. Additionally, you'll learn how to write and format DAX formulas, which consist of expressions that use functions, operators, references to model objects, constants, and variables.
